effect_description_sunset: Increase proc rate of skills. Chance to deal double damage.
EquipCompose_SynthesisInfo:
1. Some rare items require specific Synthesizing methods. Recipes are sometimes obtained in-game.
2. If you don't follow the method while inserting items, synthesided products will be random.
3. The pros and cons of randomly synthesized products are
item__141002--details: Namecard for a resident of the Fire Village, the name written on it is unknown to you.
item__150302--details: This gem can bring good luck and increase the value of your synthesis!
item__150319--details: Although it glitters, it is actually the result of a failed synthesis. So it's probably useless.
item__150347--details: Will generate a random item from above.

npc__11001--talk: The Sakura mainland is shrouded in darkness. Only the most powerful ninjas can survive this arduous challenge.
npc__11002--talk: To prove your power go to the arena. You will get a real fight there.
npc__11002--talk1: I can provide you more arena tickets if you can complete a monster hunt for me.
npc__11005--talk: Don't miss out on our collection of weapons and armor. Various equipment available at the best price.
npc__16001--talk: The Sakura mainland is shrouded in darkness. Only the most powerful ninjas can survive this arduous challenge.
npc__16001--talk__village_swap: The village you select will give you a flat +3% bonus to the proc rate of those skills.
npc__16005--talk: Don't miss out on our collection of weapons and armor. Various equipment available at the best price.
npc__21001--talk: Intelligence is very important for the completion of ninja missions.
npc__21002--talk: Woof woof! Pakkun is a smart little dog.
npc__21003--talk: Woof woof! Pakkun is a smart little dog.
npc__21004--talk: Woof woof! Pakkun is a smart little dog.

outfit_skill__10000: 10% chance to unleash a powerful move when enemy below 15% health.
prompt__refine: Without a Refining Talisman this will cost ${} stone.
tooltip__outfit--str-description: Every ${} points of Strength increases attack by 1% and block by 1 point
skill_effect_dead_demon_consuming_seal: This does a lot of stuff and I want it to be really really long descript that overlows
TaskTalk900000: Welcome to the village of ninjas! You met Gaara, which was created with my gendzhutsu, right? Of course, you do not have the strength to beat him now. But nothing, no difficulties encountered by those who do nothing. From this moment I will lead your training and I'll look forward to the day when you become an outstanding ninja! So are you ready to start?
quest__10001--info:
Now that you have seen the power of a world class ninja it's time to begin your training.

Outside of the village there live [[monster__33017--name]] who have started assaulting travelers.

For your first Trial you must eliminate the crazed [[monster__33017--name]].
quest__10001--submit: Congratulations on passing the Trial. You are now a qualified ninja.
quest__10002--info: To become a ninja is not an easy thing. You need to practice and participate in the village guard squad. Go and meet <font color='#00b034'>Arena Master</font> now.
quest__10002--talk: Congratulations on passing the Trial. You are now a guard squad member.
quest__10002--submit: Protecting the village and tourists passing through the village is the guard squads mission.
quest__10003--info: Even though we sent people, the <font color='#00b034'>Sunflower</font> catastrophe happend at the <font color='#00b034'>Smelting Mountains</font>. <font color='#00b034'>Genin</font> has asked for help, go now and help keep the peace.
quest__10003--talk: Why would a normally peacful monster suddenly go berserk? We have to finish this quick. Why haven't the village reinforcements arrived yet?
quest__10003--submit: You're the one sent from the guard squad? I've been waiting a while for you.
quest__10004--info: <font color='#00b034'>Bees</font> have become really aggressive and many people have already been stung. Help me gather <font color='#00b034'>Bee Stingers</font> to create an antidote.
quest__10004--submit: Thank you for getting <font color='#00b034'>Bee Stingers</font>, now I can treat the tourists who are suffering.
quest__10005--info: Thanks to your effors the <font color='#00b034'>Bees</font> no longer pose a threat to tourist. Return to the village and give the good news to the <font color='#00b034'>Arena Master</font>.
quest__10005--talk: Has the crisis at the <font color='#00b034'>Smelting Mountains</font> been resolved? That is indeed good news.
quest__10005--submit: The <font color='#00b034'>Village Elder</font> obviously didn't choose the wrong recruit. Your first mission performance was very good.
quest__10006--info:
With the crisis over the Village Elder has decied to hold a banquet to celebrate.
We need to gather food for the banquet. Head to Smelting Mountains and gather some declious Sushi Rolls from the Sushi that live there.
quest__10006--submit: Ah ha! There you are, what wonderful looking <font color='#00b034'>Sushi Rolls</font>. Just the scent is enough to make me cry tears of joy, the villagers will be overjoyed.
quest__10007--info: Now that we have <font color='#00b034'>Sushi Rolls</font> go tell the villagers to join the banquet. <font color='#00b034'>Village Elder</font> is already waiting in the hall, go invite the <font color='#00b034'>Blacksmith</font> and <font color='#00b034'>Merchant</font>.
quest__10007--talk: Got it, I'll leave after I finish solidifying this iron.
quest__10007--talk1: I'll be there after I finish packing up these things.
quest__10007--submit: Now that the villagers are here it's time to celebrate.
quest__10008--info: A series of chaotic events has occured at the <font color='#00b034'>Eventide Barrens</font> recently. I believe that all of these events happening across <font color='#00b034'>Sakura Mainland</font> are related. To confirm this theory I sent <font color='#00b034'>Genin</font> out to investigate but they haven't reported back yet. Please go check on them to see if they need any help.
quest__10008--talk: The <font color='#00b034'>Village Elder</font> sent you? That's so kind!
quest__10008--submit: I'm glad you are here, I need your help.
quest__10009--info: After I gathered information I was attacked by a group calling themselves the <font color='#00b034'>Scarlet Bandits</font>. If you can help me take them out then I can return to the village safely.
quest__10009--submit: For the bandits to have chased me this far they must be taking instructions from someone else.
quest__10010--info: As I was attacked I sent <font color='#00b034'>Pakkun</font> to hide. Talk to him for the information I gathered.
quest__10010--talk: Woof woof! You look familiar, are you from the <font color='#00b034'>Village</font> as well?
quest__10010--submit: So my owner asked you to help me?
quest__10011--info: Woof woof! So my owner asked you to get information from me? <font color='#00b034'>Pakkun</font> smart and knows not to lose things that are important.
quest__10011--talk: Take this <font color='#00b034'>Recon Scroll</font> to the <font color='#00b034'>[[npc__11001--name]]</font>.
quest__10011--submit: So <font color='#00b034'>Genin</font> was attacked by bandits. It's thanks to you arriving in time that we managed to retrive the <font color='#00b034'>Recon Scroll</font>.
quest__10012--info: Upon receiving news that monsters are planning to attack the village, the <font color='#00b034'>[[npc__11001--name]]</font> has decided to strike first.
quest__10012--submit: Hopefully this has taught the monsters a lesson. At the very least they won't be able to retaliate for awhile.
quest__10013--info: <font color='#00b034'>[[npc__21002--name]]</font> ran off earlier could you find him and see what caught his attention?
quest__10013--talk: Woof woof! <font color='#00b034'>[[npc__21002--name]]</font> has discovered a big secret, do you ant to know?
quest__10013--submit: <font color='#00b034'>[[npc__21002--name]]</font> found a suspicious man in black at the gathering place of the bandits. After following and observing his actions it is decided this man in black is leading the bandits.
quest__10014--info: <font color='#00b034'>[[npc__21002--name]]</font> found a man leading the bandits. We can uncover a lot of secrets if we catch that guy but first we have to get through the bandits.
quest__10014--submit: You defeated the bandits but the leader got away. Hopefully this is enough for the people here to live safely.
quest__10015--info:
Woof woof! [[npc__21002--name]] found a face mask the bandit leader dropped. Why does [[npc__21002--name]] find this scent familiar... but I can't recall who it is.

Why don't you ask the master, maybe she knows the owner of this mask.
quest__10015--talk:
A mask, let me see

This looks familiar, could this be his?
quest__10015--submit: He was the prodigy of the <font color='#00b034'>[[scene__411--name]]</font>, the one who was always in the top spot of every trial. The [[npc__11001--name]] respected him a lot, sending him to [[scene__161--name]] for special training. Soon after, he disappeared and now we find him behind these strange bandits.
quest__10016--info: If he is the mastermind behind these attakcs then this needs to be report to the <font color='#00b034'>[[npc__11001--name]]</font>.
quest__10016--talk: If the man in black is him then he has become completely lost in the depths of his power.
quest__10016--submit: I will send someone to investigate, I cannot let him continue down this sinful path.
quest__10017--info: You have completed this mission. Now is the time for you to know something.Relax, and listen to me patiently.
quest__10017--talk: We begin this story during the time of the War Demon and the great battle that happened 300 years ago. A demon of great power named Leyasu appeared in Sakura Mainland. This demon sowed chaos and discord throughout the land, scorhed the fertile fields and made the people feel like they were living in hell. Finially an Elite Ninja stepped up to fight Leyasu, leading 5 students across the land he gathered people to help fight against the demon and his armies. After a long and difficult battle Leyasu was defeated, to prevent Leyasu and his followers from rising again they were sealed by the Elite Ninja in Demon City. To prevent Leyasu from escaping and spreading chaos on the world again the Elite Ninja founded Angel City and 5 major ninja villages, then sent his 5 students to become the head of each village so they could protect the land and Angel City. As one of the major villages it is our duty to train ninjas who will go to Angel City and become part of the Sealing Team there containing Leyasu for all of time.
quest__10017--submit: He's one of the ninjas that was sent to<font color='#00b034'>Angel City</font> to be part of the Sealing Team. I can't believe his has succumbed to the temptations of darkness.
quest__10018--info: It is about time for the village to select a new group of ninjas for the Sealing Team in Angel City. There has been a surge in demon activity recently, one of those being the Potato Demon. They have started to steal crops from the smaller villages. Without those crops the villagers will starve this coming winter. If you can get rid of the Potato Demons then you will be qualified to join the Sealing Team in Angel City.
quest__10018--submit: You have proven your strength and passed the trial. There is still some time before you leave for Angel City, I hope that you will conitnue your training during this period and become even stronger for your future challenges.
quest__10019--info: Ah yes, the Merchant Boss seems to be having a bit of trouble. Why don't you help out while waiting to leave?
quest__10019--talk: Where is that Traveling Merchant! The villagers will be upset with me if their stuff isn't here on time.
quest__10019--submit: Oh the Village Elder asked you to come help me? Wondeful, can you find the Traveling Merchant for me?
quest__10020--info: My supplier regularly sends sends with the Traveling Merchant but it has been several days since the last delivery. I'm afraid he may have found trouble on his way here, can you go check to see if he is okay?
quest__10020--talk: Hello there, yes I am the Traveling Merchant headed to the village.
quest__10020--submit: My way is currently blocked by the damned monkeys. Can you help me teach the a lesson?
quest__10021--info: The nearby Grinning Monkeys stole my merchandise while I was resting. Since you are hear can you help me get it back from them?
quest__10021--submit: Thank you so much! I have to rush to the village so I don't miss the deadline or the villagers will be quite upset!
quest__10022--info: The world seems to be falling into chaos with all the demons running about. I heard there are bandits nearby, could you take care of them and escort me to the village at the same time?
quest__10022--submit: Finally the Traveling Merchant has arrived. Now I just need to let the villagers know. Take this elixir as a token of my appreciation.
quest__10023--info: Ninja who is running a special exercise in <font color = '#00B034'> [[scene__161--name]] </font> will move. I remember that you were among them. Fast and report to <font color = '#00B034'> [[npc__11001--name]] </font>.
quest__10023--talk:
I heard that you have helped a lot [[npc__11005--name]] . good! Helping the public and maintaining relationships with them is the right ninja way!
Get ready to move out. [[npc__21001--name]] will tell you how to go to [[scene__161--name]] . Work hard when you are there. Never deviate from the ninja road.
quest__10023--submit: I don't know you are being sent to <font color = '#00B034'> [[scene__161--name]] </font> to participate in special training as well. To see you grow from amateur until now. it makes me happy!
quest__10024--info:
Ninja who participated in special exercises must go to [[scene__161--name]] [[scene__2601--name]] to report to [[npc__26001--name]] . I once attended a special training. but I did not pass the final exam. and sent back to [[scene__fire_village--name]] . I still learned a lot during the training period. Ah. what is the noble today!
Ah yes. I want to send some prizes to Chairman Yuan . Can you help me meet [[item__140033--name]] and [[item__140034--name]] ?
quest__10024--submit: The quality obtained <font color = '#00B034'>[[item__140033--name]]</font> and <font color = '#00B034'> [[item__140034--name]] </font> is very good. I can use this to make <font color = '#00B034'> good melon rice ball </font>.
quest__10025--info: Open [World Map]. select <font color = '#00B034'> [[scene__2601--name]] </font> and click to enter the zone <font color = '#00B034'> [[scene__161--name]] </font>. Fast and report to <font color = '#00B034'> [[npc__26001--name]] </font>.
quest__10025--talk: Oh yes. hold on to <font color = '#00B034'> Honeydew Riceballs </font>. Remember to help me give it to <font color = '#00B034'> [[npc__26001--name]] </font>.
quest__10025--submit:
Chairman of Yuan I was responsible for special ninja training in [[scene__161--name]] .
Gifts from [[scene__fire_village--name]] . [[npc__21001--name]] asks you to give me. I remember now. that young women are agile. good children. Unfortunately his physical condition is not good enough to withstand severe training.
quest__10026--info: Since you are here to take part in special training. I want to see what you get. Around <font color = '#00B035'> [[monster__33016--name]] </font> have caused many problems for residents. going to give him a lesson.
quest__10026--submit: Very good. you look strong basic. I will teach you well.
quest__10027--info: Now go to welcome <font color = '#00B034'> [[npc__16001--name]] </font>. He is in the hall on the mountain <font color = '#00B034'> [[scene__161--name]] </font>. waiting for your arrival.
quest__10027--talk: So you are a ninja from <font color = '#00B034'> [[scene__fire_village--name]] </font>. here to participate in special training. Not too bad. young one. You look alert. Seeing you reminds me of my days younger.
quest__10027--submit: Rest well and familiarize yourself with <font color = '#00B034'> [[scene__161--name]] </font>. you must stay here for a while.
quest__10028--info: For ninja. completing the mission without hurting yourself is not just a problem with the ability. Citizens' support is as important. You must first see if there are residents who need help.
quest__10028--talk: You have to be a new ninja. You don't look like that!
quest__10028--submit: Forget that. official <font color = '#00B034'> City of the Angel </font> The ninja are busy with anyone. I can't even find people to help me. You hope me the best!
quest__10029--info: I recently went to the ruins of the kingdom near <font color = '#00b034'> [[scene__2102--name]] </font> to explore the relics. but was attacked by <font color = '#00B034'> [[monster__33011--name]] </font> around there. Will you help me punish <font color = '#00B034'> [[monster__33011--name]] </font> who attacks innocent travelers?
quest__10029--submit: <font color = '#00B034'> [[monster__33011--name]] </font> has been punished. this is good news. Excavation for ancient treasure in <font color = '#00B034'> [[scene__2102--name]] </font> can be continued.
quest__10030--info: Even if you don't look for it. you remain effective in your work. That was my fault because it underestimated you. Now report to <font color = '#00B034'> [[npc__26001--name]] </font>.
quest__10030--talk: Not too bad. even very thorough <font color = '#00B034'> [[npc__11005--name]] </font> has praised you. You are a rare person.
quest__10030--submit: Weight special training will begin. I will not be smooth during this time.
quest__10031--info: After this special training period. you have appeared to make a lot of improvement. It's time to practice fighting to test the results of your training. . Look for him and see if you can solve the problem.
quest__10031--talk: What <font color = '#00B034'> Chairman Yuan </font> sent you?
quest__10031--submit: That's good. with your help. they are <font color = '#00B034'> [[monster__33015--name]] </font> will get a decent punishment.
quest__10032--info:
I just went to visit my husband on duty outside. and on the way back. I saw a charming flower flower. Amazed by their colors. I tried to look closer. and I was afraid of them where there was [[monster__33015--name]] disguised! I was almost eaten by them!
Can you help me get rid of the Bunga Devil? Remember to take the mask they use to deceive tourists.
quest__10032--submit: This is a mask. they are <font color = '#00B034'> [[monster__33015--name]] </font> has finally been punished. There will be no more tourists captivated and harmed by them. all thanks to you!
quest__10033--info: I heard <font color = '#00B034'> [[npc__21003--name]] </font> got one problem. <font color = '#00B034'> [[npc__26001--name]] </font> Want you to go to <font color = '#00B034'> [[scene__2102--name]] </font> to help him. you can go now.
quest__10033--talk: Why am I so unlucky to deal with bandits!
quest__10033--submit: You are the <font color = '#00B034'> Chairman Yuan </font> send? You don't look very strong. hmmm. Guess we only have to depend on you!
quest__10034--info:
I have returned from [[scene__161--name]] with supplies when I met several frightening -faced people who tried to ask for money. Is the security [[scene__fire_village--name]] damaged with such conditions?!
Even though you are not sure. but you are the only one who can get rid of the bandit now.
quest__10034--submit: Your appearance fools your greatness. my items are safe to be protected.
quest__10035--info: You are indeed a ninja from <font color = '#00B034'> [[scene__161--name]] </font>. You have to thank the <font color = '#00B034'> Chairman Yuan </font>.
quest__10035--talk: Not too bad. it seems you have started to display your great strength.
quest__10035--submit: Good rest. heavy challenges waiting for you.
quest__10036--info: Corruption from people caused by evil power has changed them to vice versa. The most honest people are close <font color = '#00B034'> [[monster__32010--name]] </font> has also been oppressed by crime. You now have to overcome chaos and prevent them from experiencing more losses.
quest__10036--submit: Huff. for honest villagers who have fallen into this country. is it possible that the gossip of darkness has really come down on our peaceful land?
quest__10037--info: Even though a number of villages have been separated from the darkness. their homes were destroyed beyond the limits. We must help them rebuild their homes. For details. you can ask <font color = '#00B034'> [[npc__26002--name]] </font>.
quest__10037--talk: The villagers who lost their house were too sad!
quest__10037--submit: Helping villagers rebuild their homes? Alright. I'll do my best.
quest__10038--info: To rebuild their homes. we first need stable food resources. We can rely on everyone's help to stem temporary food shortages. but the best is to get a suitable plant for agriculture. Color = '#00B034'> [[monster__33019--name]] </font>. Like eating a variety of food. defeat him to get premium <font color = '#00B034'> [[item__140031--name]] </font>. Planting this ball cake will produce a harvest in a short time. Villagers do not need to worry about food if we get <font color = '#00B034'> [[item__140031--name]] </font>.
quest__10038--submit: We have enough <font color = '#00B034'> [[item__140031--name]] </font>. villagers do not need to worry about food anymore!
quest__10039--info: Bad news! The mob <font color = '#00B034'> [[monster__32015--name]] </font> had just shown the village from nowhere and robbed their valuables! We don't have to let them go so easily.
quest__10039--submit: Although bandits have been taken to court. we did not pay attention to one of the valuables looted. where were they hidden?
quest__10040--info: I heard the bandits <font color = '#00B034'> [[scene__2103--name]] </font> camping in <font color = '#00B034'> [[scene__fire_village--name]] </font>. Investigate the place and see what you can find.
quest__10040--talk: <font color = '#00B034'> [[monster__32015--name]] </font>. are you related to these cursed bandits?
quest__10040--submit: I think Bandit has gone to <font color = '#00B034'> [[scene__161--name]] </font> to cause chaos. that's why we did not find their traces for so long.
quest__10041--info: So the bandit has been defeated by you. this is a good news. Even though I don't know <font color = '#00B034'> [[item__140048--name]] </font> gathered in the hole. I know their behavior in <font color = '#00B034' > [[scene__2103--name]] </font>. Digrain them behind to plunder valuables. Serang Digrats to find the treasure of the bandits.
quest__10041--submit: Find valuables that are looted and villagers can rebuild their homes correctly.
quest__10042--info: Villagers have begun to rebuild their village. You can report this to <font color = '#00B034'> Chairman Yuan </font>.
quest__10042--talk: Through your efforts. the village community has new hopes. Feeling good. right?
quest__10042--submit: Although the crisis of the villagers has been overcome. but the flood has recently been a pleasant event. Can I think something?
quest__10043--info: A major event has occurred in <font color = '#00B034'> [[scene__161--name]] </font>. fast and report this to <font color ='#00B034 '> [[npc__16001--name]] </font>.
quest__10043--talk: To think there is a devil in <font color = '#00B034'> [[scene__161--name]] </font>. The devils were sealed in <font color = '#00B034'> [[scene__171--name]] </font> had begun to move.
quest__10043--submit: Really a surprise that <font color = '#00B034'> [[npc__26001--name]] </font> recommend you for this mission. Looks like you have obtained his approval.
quest__10044--info:
Apparently the devil has appeared near [[scene__161--name]] . go to investigate this.
The first news comes from [[npc__11005--name]]
quest__10044--talk: Only a few days ago. I saw. in the sky. winged creatures fly through <font color = '#00B034'> [[scene__161--name]] </font> to go to <font color = '#00B034'> [[scene__2601--name]] </font>. Blood drips from the sky to the ground. it's terrible!
quest__10044--submit: The devil has a scary voice. a good thing I haven't found that.
quest__10045--name: The Phantom of the Night, Three
quest__10045--info: Lately. strange sounds are often heard in the northern area of the hill Go there and see. You might find something there.
quest__10045--submit: Luckily we destroyed Satan for time. otherwise the consequences would be unexpected!
quest__10046--info:
You already know about [the seal demon war] that shook 300 years ago. Finally. Demonieyasu and his accomplices are sealed in [[scene__171--name]] . and [[scene__161--name]] Aura Suppressing City of Devil .
Everything you face may be the devil who escaped from City of Demon . You go to [[scene__2605--name]] now and know more about the activities of the devils from [[npc__26007--name]] Garrisoned there.
quest__10046--talk: To think so many devils have run away. what should we do?!
quest__10046--submit: So <font color = '#00B034'> [[npc__16001--name]] </font> sent you to investigate the activities of the devil. I am ashamed to admit that the hustle and bustle of the new devil to the seal has resulted in the discharge of many devils. The devil found in <font color = '#00B034'> [[scene__161--name]] </font> could be one of the escape.
quest__10047--info: Thinking of giving concessions for a moment will make many devils come out. do not know how many people will be injured later. server__2--requirement: Achieve level 50 on the Mainland Server
server__3--requirement: Achieve rank Senin in arena on the Mainland Server

effect__bleed--tooltip: * Take 10% health at the start of the turn.
effect__cloud--tooltip: * Take 7% max health damage at the start of each turn.
* On damage: Apply [[effect__dazed]] for 3.5 seconds (4 times max).
* Does not apply [[effect__dazed]] or remove [[effect__dizzy]] if enemy under static status.
* 30% chance to switch sides before attack.
effect__cursed--tooltip: * Every 1% of [[stat__8]] lost increases attack by 0.5%.
* Reduce duration of other sealing skills applied to you by 50%.
effect__door--tooltip: * Increase speed by 10% per door level.
effect__drain--tooltip: * Take 6% max health as damage before every move.
* Remove 6% max chakra before every move.
effect__drunk--tooltip: * If hit by a fire skill gain [[effect__ignite]].
effect__elemental_seal--tooltip: * Elemental Skills: fire, water, earth, lightning, and wind.
effect__explosive--tooltip: * After 11 seconds the enemy receives the total damage accumulated during the duration.
effect__frozen--tooltip: * Receive ~~1,200,%~~% damage on the next attack.
effect__ghost--tooltip: * Reduce healing of non pet skills by 70%.
effect__ignite--tooltip: * Reduce total stacks by 1 after damage applies.
effect__mist--tooltip: * Cannot co-exist with [[effect__sunset]], both will be removed.
* Increases chance to prevent the enemy from moving or attacking the longer the fight goes on.
effect__poison--tooltip: * Lose 3% max health before every move.
effect__rebirth_aura--tooltip: * If [[effect__sacrifice_aura]] is active recover 15% max health at start of turn when health is less than 20%.
effect__regeneration--tooltip: * Recover 3% of max health before every move.
* Reduce total stacks by 1 after healing applies.
effect__sacrifice_aura--tooltip: * If [[effect__rebirth_aura]] is active recover 15% max health at start of turn when health is less than 20%.
effect__sunset--tooltip: * Cannot co-exist with [[effect__mist]], both will be removed.
* Increase chance to deal 2x damage on elemental skills the longer the fight goes on.
* Elemental Skills: fire, water, earth, lightning, and wind.
effect__warm--tooltip: * Receive 20% [[tooltip__damage--recoil]] when using skills that have a [[tooltip__chakra_use]] cost.
skill__1802--tooltip: [[tooltip__limitation]]: Does not apply [[effect__dazed]] if enemy is [[effect__frozen]]. Does not apply [[effect__dazed]] or remove [[effect__dizzy]] if enemy has [[effect__static]].
skill__1805--tooltip: [[tooltip__requirement]]: Activated when you have a debuff applied to you.
skill__1808--tooltip: [[tooltip__skill_effect]]: If enemy is [[effect__drunk]] apply 2 stacks of [[effect__ignite]] for 40% damage each.
[[tooltip__limitation]]: Deals no damage if enemy is [[effect__frozen]].
skill__1809--tooltip: [[tooltip__skill_effect]]: If enemy is [[effect__drunk]] apply 2 stacks of [[effect__ignite]] for 40% damage each.
[[tooltip__limitation]]: Deals no damage if enemy is [[effect__frozen]].
skill__1813--tooltip: [[tooltip__skill_effect]]: Launch a sharp whirlwind as an additional attack.
skill__1815--tooltip: [[tooltip__skill_effect]]: Absorb 3% of the enemy's chakra and lower the enemy's defense by 50.
skill__1822--tooltip: [[tooltip__damage]]: 100% [[tooltip__damage--basic]] + 7% of the enemy's max health as [[tooltip__damage--body]].
skill__1825--tooltip: [[tooltip__limitation]]: Does not apply [[effect__dazed]] if enemy is [[effect__frozen]]. Does not apply [[effect__dazed]] or remove [[effect__dizzy]] if enemy has [[effect__static]].
skill__1826--tooltip: [[tooltip__skill_effect]]: Launch an additional attack by the damage is reduced by 35%.
skill__1828--tooltip: Has a chance to be knocked back to you and damage you instead. Chances of knockback increase the longer the fight goes on.
skill__1830--tooltip: [[tooltip__skill_effect]]: Reduce enemy's chakra by 15% of your max chakra.
skill__1839--tooltip: [[tooltip__skill_effect]]: You gain a shield that will block enemy attacks. Shield strength is ~~3,18,%~~% of your max health. You gain [[effect__static]] while shield is active.
skill__3803--tooltip: * Revive with ~~9,25,%~~% of health after death.
* [[tooltip__cast_chance]] reduced the longer the fight goes on.
skill__3805--tooltip: [[tooltip__skill_effect]]: If enemy has a buff, inflict [[effect__charmed]] for ~~8,15,%~~ seconds.
skill__3806--tooltip: [[tooltip__skill_effect]]: Reflect 60% of the damage taken back to the enemy.
skill__3807--tooltip: [[tooltip__skill_effect]]: Inflict [[effect__snared]] until enemy takes a turn.
skill__3810--tooltip: [[tooltip__skill_effect]]: You gain [[effect__door]] or upgrade [[effect__door]] by one level if ~~5,10,%~~ seconds has passed since last upgrade.
skill__3811--tooltip: [[tooltip__skill_effect]]: Summon a hurricane to counter attack.
skill__3820--tooltip: * When suffering from a debuff, inflict [[effect__dizzy]] on enemy for ~~1,6,%~~ seconds.
skill__3826--tooltip: * You gain 2 stacks of [[effect__ignite]] if enemy has [[effect__ignite]].
skill__7777--tooltip: [[tooltip__skill_effect]]: Chance to prevent 40% of damage received.
skill__10000--tooltip: [[tooltip__skill_effect]]: Unleash a powerful attack when your oppenent is below 15% max health.
skill__6000: At the start of your turn 30% chance to clear 1 debuff. Can occur 2 times per battle.
valhalla__rules:
<font size=1>Cannot use recovery items.
After each battle, auto-restore 20% Health and 40% Chakra.
Challenge level Abyss requires an Abyss Pass.</font>
